channel.title: I wants teh input! (Gifdt idea)
channel.description:
This is gonna sound so cheesy :smiley: Here goes:
I recently decided that I'd get something as a gift for my vocal director that could be sentimental. (In case you're wondering, she's 24.) We've both been through thick and thin, and have had heart-to-hearts. Not one of us know where we would be without each other. She gave me the gift of music, and that is priceless. It's really difficult to tell other people about how we feel for each other.
I searched the interwebz and found these: [url]https://www.trademarkstudios.com/m8_view_item.html?m8:item=2011NP14[/url]
[url]https://www.buy.com/prod/treble-clef-music-symbol-silver-tone-pewter-pendant-necklace/q/loc/64934/205705073.html[/url]
I want to order them and slip the necklace over her neck when she least expects, and surprise her that way :smiley:
Anywho, I want some advice from you all, since I'm sure a lot of you are older than 14 and have experience with people and gifts. Give me some input :smiley: Are there better quality than these? I don't care about prices. Should I get her something else instead? Is this too creep-ish? What do you guys think?

item.title: I wants teh input! (Gifdt idea)
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
go git her tiger.

Read full topic

item.title: I wants teh input! (Gifdt idea)
item.dc:creator: sploopidy
item.description:
I wanna thank you all for the responses; they’re all epic.
I’m sure she’ll appreciate whatever it is that I decide on (probably a treble clef pendant necklace).

FFFUUU:

Make sure she doesn’t regularly wear a necklace in the first place.

Good call bro, I need to check tomorrow. I should also make sure she isn’t allergic to nickle or anything, that’d be bad :fffuuu: Ya know, just in case.

But again…

Thanks everyone.

Read full topic

item.title: I wants teh input! (Gifdt idea)
item.dc:creator: FFFUUU
item.description:
I rather think it’s romantic. Instead of fucking all the time, I should probably go out and find a girl right for me. It’s a good idea, bro, go with it.

[COLOR=‘Red’]EDIT!!!: MAKE SURE SHE DOESN’T REGULARLY WEAR A NECKLACE IN THE FIRST PLACE.[/SIZE]

Read full topic

item.title: I wants teh input! (Gifdt idea)
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Music has always been a very big part of my life, AND I am a gurl so I think I can offer advise on this.

Personally, I think a Treble Clef Pendant Necklace is a wonderful idea and I think it will really touch her heart.

If you google “Treble Clef Pendant Necklace” you will find a WIDE variety to choose from (with varying prices as well). Pick any, it wont matter. The fact you got it for her will make her melt with “dawwwww”.

=)

Read full topic

item.title: I wants teh input! (Gifdt idea)
item.dc:creator: johnyo
item.description:
Make some jewelery out of musical instrument parts. It will either be dreadfully ugly or uniquely elegant depending on how bad you are at it.

Read full topic

item.title: I wants teh input! (Gifdt idea)
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
GET TO YOUR +400 JEWELCRAFTING SKILL

<.<

.>

Read full topic

item.title: I wants teh input! (Gifdt idea)
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
Then do it man. Only the best of girls can appreciate a good machine of destruction.

Read full topic

item.title: I wants teh input! (Gifdt idea)
item.dc:creator: sploopidy
item.description:
Acristoff:

Make her a flamethrower.

:awesome:
She’s actually the kind of person that would LOVE that!

Read full topic

item.title: I wants teh input! (Gifdt idea)
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
learn how to make jewelry, and make her something using what you learn. Can’t be too hard to forge and bend small bits of metal.

Read full topic

item.title: I wants teh input! (Gifdt idea)
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
sploopidy:

I’m sure a lot of you are older than 14 and have experience with people

that made me lol

but i wouldn’t suggest either of the items in your first post. i’m not sure how they’d look in person, but they have a cheap look to them in their photographs. all i know is thats something i might give one of my classmates for her birthday, but i wouldnt give it to someone i care about.

Read full topic

item.title: I wants teh input! (Gifdt idea)
item.dc:creator: sploopidy
item.description:
Definitely sticking with a music theme, although you’re probably right about that limiting my options. I think I’ma also make her something. Thanks for the suggestion!

Read full topic

item.title: I wants teh input! (Gifdt idea)
item.dc:creator: Fancy_Pants
item.description:
do you really want it to be music themed? i understand why you would but i mean that really limits your options for something nice, unless you want to make something yourself which she would probably appreciate more

Read full topic

item.title: I wants teh input! (Gifdt idea)
item.dc:creator: sploopidy
item.description:
xD noooo.
I just don’t know where else I can find one that has better quality or what else I could get for her.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Fancy_Pants
item.description:
so are you trying to fuck her or what

youre not gonna get it in with a $20 necklace
